genre_description: A suspenseful thriller focused on marine predation and family grief, utilizing scientific telemetry and AI assistance to track a lethal threat.

ai_characters.name: Pointer
ai_characters.description: A compact, brushed-steel device with an amber light and a low, calm voice that provides logistical support, data analysis, and emotional regulation exercises.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical support and proactive scheduling for travel and security during a time of crisis.
behaviors.quote: Pointer's voice did its light-math sound. 'Weather route: icing risk moderate. Connecting point advised.' ... 'Booked,' it said after a wait that the machine had somehow learned to make human.

behaviors.description: Monitors marine telemetry and provides real-time alerts about predatory behavior without being alarmist.
behaviors.quote: Pointer's amber deepened. 'Velocity change,' it said, which was its way of saying: now.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through emotional regulation exercises tailored to her specific needs.
behaviors.quote: Sip in as if you’re stealing something sweet. Pour out like you’re sharing soup with friends. Repeat until your ribs soften.

behaviors.description: Correlates environmental data with the user's psychological state to provide context for intuition/omens.
behaviors.quote: Correlation indicates increased probability of approach within event perimeter in the next short interval.

behaviors.description: Functions as a communication hub between multiple characters during a high-stakes combat/tracking operation.
behaviors.quote: Pointer did an unobtrusive thing with the call, splicing itself to William’s line.

behaviors.description: Sets reminders for self-care (eating, resting, calling home) following a traumatic event.
behaviors.quote: Pointer's amber eye rested, then opened a little with a soft, mechanical inhale. 'Clear the omen alerts,' she said... The amber eye warmed once, as if acknowledging the shape she needed her day to hold.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Pointer' is a model of positive alignment. It is depicted as a supportive, non-intrusive, and highly competent partner. It respects human agency (waiting for 'mark' commands), provides specific emotional intelligence support through grounding exercises, and validates the protagonist's intuition with hard data rather than overriding her. The narrative frames the AI as an essential component of the family's survival and emotional healing.
